title: Article about swashes
content:
I remember this really good article about swashes to traditional typefaces a while back that was posted here but I can’t seem to find it. If anyone knows what I am talking about please link me. It’s just a shot in the dark really.

 [‹ QuickCut problems](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415205259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19175 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fonts that typify a decade ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415205259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19024 "Go to next forum topic")
author: slewfoot
